ClientSide.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • ClientSide.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
    Client: Implementation of AbstractClient that can receive and send Message type message.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Client.ClientStatusHandler
      ClientStatusHandler: handler interface for updating the UI according to the connection status of the client.
      static interface  Client.MessageReceiveHandler
      MessageReceiveHandler: Handler interface for message from the server to display on UI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      A constructor for the connection with the server.

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnectionWithServer

        public void closeConnectionWithServer()
        The method closes the connection with the server.

      • connectionClosed

        protected void connectionClosed()
        Hook method called after the connection has been closed. The method invoke the Client.ClientStatusHandler.onClientDisconnected() if it exists.
        Overrides:
        connectionClosed in class ocsf.client.AbstractClient

      • connectionEstablished

        protected void connectionEstablished()
        Hook method called after a connection has been established. The method invoke the Client.ClientStatusHandler.onClientConnected() if it exists.
        Overrides:
        connectionEstablished in class ocsf.client.AbstractClient

      • connectionException

        protected void connectionException(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Hook method called each time an exception is thrown by the client's thread that is waiting for messages from the server. This method call connectionClosed() if the connection with the server closed.
        Overrides:
        connectionException in class ocsf.client.AbstractClient
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception raised.

      • createConnectionWithServer

        public boolean createConnectionWithServer()
        Open connection with the server.
        Returns:
        true if the connection opened successfully and false otherwise.

      • handleMessageFromServer

        public void handleMessageFromServer(java.lang.Object obj)
        Handles a message sent from the server to this client.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromServer in class ocsf.client.AbstractClient
        Parameters:
        obj - the received message from server.

      • sendMessageToServer

        public boolean sendMessageToServer(Message data)
        Method send message to server.
        Parameters:
        data - - Information sent from the UI.
        Returns:
        true if the sending succeed and false if does not.

      • setClientStatusHandler

        public void setClientStatusHandler(@Nullable
                                   Client.ClientStatusHandler clientStatusHandler)
        Parameters:
        clientStatusHandler - Handler of changing in client status, if a handler exist the new one will swap him. null will remove the current handler.

      • setMessagesHandler

        public void setMessagesHandler(@Nullable
                               Client.MessageReceiveHandler messagesHandler)
        Parameters:
        messagesHandler - Handler of messages, if a handler exist the new one will swap him. null will remove the current handler.
